mapper.select: select wpc.id,wpc.matchId,wpcu.result number from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group wpcu left join worldcup_pk_contract_group wpc on wpcu.cid=wpc.id where wpcu.uid=#{openId} and wpc.status=2
select id from worldcup_pk_contract_group where matchId=#{matchId} and guessType=#{type}
select wpu.openid,wpu.nickname,wpu.imageUrl,wpu.currency from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group cug left join worldcup_pk_user wpu on cug.uid=wpu.openid where cug.result=#{result}
select result from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group where cid=#{cid} and uid=#{uid}

select "好友赛" as type,c.id cid,u.nickname,u.imageUrl,c.status from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group cu left join worldcup_pk_contract_group c on cu.cid=c.id left join worldcup_pk_create_contract_group cc on cu.cid=cc.cid left join worldcup_pk_user u on cc.createUser=u.openid where cu.uid=#{uid} and c.matchId=#{matchId} and cu.yn=1 and c.yn=1 and cc.yn=1
select count(cu.uid) from worldcup_pk_contract_group c right join worldcup_pk_contract_user_group cu on c.id=cu.cid where c.matchId=#{matchId} and c.yn=1 and cu.yn=1
select c.id from worldcup_pk_create_contract_group cc left join worldcup_pk_contract_group c on cc.cid=c.id where cc.createUser=#{uid} and c.matchId=#{matchId} and cc.yn=1 and c.yn=1 limit 1
select c.id from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group cc left join worldcup_pk_contract_group c on cc.cid=c.id where cc.uid=#{uid} and c.matchId=#{matchId} and cc.yn=1 and c.yn=1 limit 1
select number from worldcup_pk_contract_group where id=#{cid}
select id,guessType,status,number,matchId,time from worldcup_pk_contract_group where id=#{cid} and yn=1

select wpu.nickname name,wpu.imageUrl,cug.number,cug.myGuess from worldcup_pk_user wpu left join worldcup_pk_contract_user_group cug on wpu.openid=cug.uid
where cug.cid=#{cid} and cug.yn=1
select sum(cug.number) from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group cug left join worldcup_pk_contract_group cg on cug.cid=cg.id where cg.matchId=#{matchId} and cug.yn=1 and cg.yn=1
select imageUrl from worldcup_pk_user wpu right join worldcup_pk_contract_user_group cug on cug.uid=wpu.openid order by cug.time desc limit 5
select count(uid) from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group where cid=#{cid} and yn=1
mapper.update: update worldcup_pk_contract_user_group set result=#{result} where cid=#{cid} and uid=#{uid} and yn=1
mapper.select: select id from worldcup_pk_contract_group where time < DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) and status=0 and yn=1
mapper.update: update worldcup_pk_contract_group set status=1 where id=#{cid} and yn=1
